docs.snippet: The Broncos and the pass rusher DeMarcus Ware agreed on a three-year deal, and the Browns released quarterbacks Brandon Weeden and Jason Campbell....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Broncos and the pass rusher DeMarcus Ware agreed on a three-year deal, and the Browns released quarterbacks Brandon Weeden and Jason Campbell.
docs.abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos sign defensive end DeMarcus Ware for $30 million; other football news noted.

headline.main: Ware Lands in Denver; Weeden Released by Cleveland
headline.print_headline: Ware Lands in Denver; Weeden Is Released by Cleveland

docs.snippet: The Patriots snatched up Darrelle Revis hours after the Buccaneers released him, according to a person in the N.F.L. The Jets agreed to terms with the former Broncos receiver Eric Decker....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Patriots snatched up Darrelle Revis hours after the Buccaneers released him, according to a person in the N.F.L. The Jets agreed to terms with the former Broncos receiver Eric Decker.
docs.abstract: New England Patriots sign cornerback Darrelle Revis for $12 million; New York Jets have yet to sign any new players.

headline.main: Patriots Said to Add Darrelle Revis; the Jets Pick Up Eric Decker
headline.print_headline: Pats Said to Add Revis as the Jets Stay Quiet

docs.snippet: Chris Fowler is taking over play-by-play responsibilities for the marquee Saturday night college football game on ABC....
docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Fowler is taking over play-by-play responsibilities for the marquee Saturday night college football game on ABC.

headline.main: Fowler to Call 'Saturday Night Football' on ABC
headline.print_headline: Fowler to Call 'Saturday Night Football' on ABC

docs.snippet: FIFA president Sepp Blatter does not want to see any more flares and firecrackers in soccer stadiums and described the people who let them off as arsonists....
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA president Sepp Blatter does not want to see any more flares and firecrackers in soccer stadiums and described the people who let them off as arsonists.

headline.main: Blatter Wants Flares to Go Out of Fashion in Stadiums
headline.print_headline: Blatter Wants Flares to Go Out of Fashion in Stadiums

docs.snippet: One of two defense lawyers who represented former Penn State assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky at his child sex abuse trial has voluntarily surrendered his license to practice law in Pennsylvania. The move comes amid an investigation into al...
docs.lead_paragraph: One of two defense lawyers who represented former Penn State assistant football coach Jerry Sandusky at his child sex abuse trial has voluntarily surrendered his license to practice law in Pennsylvania. The move comes amid an investigation into allegations of misappropriation of client funds.

headline.main: Jerry Sandusky's Ex-Lawyer Surrenders Law License
headline.print_headline: Jerry Sandusky's Ex-Lawyer Surrenders Law License

docs.snippet: Swedish researchers say they have devised a blood test that could better diagnose sports-related brain injuries and prevent American football, rugby and ice hockey players returning to the field in danger....
docs.lead_paragraph: Swedish researchers say they have devised a blood test that could better diagnose sports-related brain injuries and prevent American football, rugby and ice hockey players returning to the field in danger.

headline.main: Blood Test Offers Swifter, Safer Diagnosis of Sport Brain Injury
headline.print_headline: Blood Test Offers Swifter, Safer Diagnosis of Sport Brain Injury

docs.snippet: The former chief of U.S. college football's Fiesta Bowl was sentenced to eight months in prison on Thursday for leading a scheme to illegally funnel roughly $50,000 from bowl employees to political campaigns....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former chief of U.S. college football's Fiesta Bowl was sentenced to eight months in prison on Thursday for leading a scheme to illegally funnel roughly $50,000 from bowl employees to political campaigns.

headline.main: Ex-Fiesta Bowl Chief Gets Eight Months for Illegal U.S. Campaign Donations
headline.print_headline: Ex-Fiesta Bowl Chief Gets Eight Months for Illegal U.S. Campaign Donations

docs.snippet: A German court convicted Bayern Munich president Uli Hoeness of tax evasion on Thursday and sentenced the man who turned the football club into one of the world's most successful sports dynasties to 3-1/2 years in jail....
docs.lead_paragraph: A German court convicted Bayern Munich president Uli Hoeness of tax evasion on Thursday and sentenced the man who turned the football club into one of the world's most successful sports dynasties to 3-1/2 years in jail.

headline.main: German Court Sentences Bayern Boss Hoeness to Jail for Tax Evasion
headline.print_headline: German Court Sentences Bayern Boss Hoeness to Jail for Tax Evasion

docs.snippet: Former pro football star Darren Sharper, who faces accusations in several states of drugging and raping women, was ordered held without bail by a Los Angeles judge on Thursday, based on charges filed against him this week in Arizona....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former pro football star Darren Sharper, who faces accusations in several states of drugging and raping women, was ordered held without bail by a Los Angeles judge on Thursday, based on charges filed against him this week in Arizona.

headline.main: Ex-NFL Star Sharper Ordered Held Without Bail in Los Angeles
headline.print_headline: Ex-NFL Star Sharper Ordered Held Without Bail in Los Angeles

docs.snippet: The Philadelphia Eagles added another potent weapon to their up-tempo offense on Thursday by trading for versatile running back Darren Sproles from the New Orleans Saints, the NFL website reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Eagles added another potent weapon to their up-tempo offense on Thursday by trading for versatile running back Darren Sproles from the New Orleans Saints, the NFL website reported.

headline.main: Eagles Obtain Sproles From Saints for Draft Pick
headline.print_headline: Eagles Obtain Sproles From Saints for Draft Pick
